content:
Wolsz family

1 Zanwel/Samuel WOLSZ
 + Mindli                            - before 1818
  2x Uriasz WOLSZ                    1745 - 1825 #277 {census family 417}
    + Dwerla                         1750 (Szmelke)
     3x Leibel Noach WOLSZ           1777 - 1840 #26
       + Hanny LERNER                1790-1801 (Markus)
        4x Izaak Mordche WOLTZ       1819 #212 - 1843-70
          + Rywka GROSS              1821 #228
                married Mar 14, 1839 #22
           5o Marya HOROWITZ         1843 #237
             * Jozef SPINZ           1826 Tarnow
              6o Feige SPINZ         1863 Krakow
              6x Salomon Peretz SPINZ  Feb 18, 1866 #160 - after 1929
                + Jachet Freude BLATT  Aug 15, 1873 Klasno Wieliczka - after 1940
                      married Sep 10, 1905 #163
                 7o Maria SPINZ      Dec 18, 1898/ Jan 3, 1899 Klasno Wieliczka - after 1940
                 7x Jozef SPINZ      Mar 30, 1901 Krakow
                 7o Halina SPINZ     Apr 9, 1912 #306 - after 1940
              6o Channe SPINZ        1867 (1868 #459)
                * Abraham Mojzesz Adam HILLER  - Mar 15, 1912
                 7o Marya SPINZ      Jun 10, 1902 #404
                 7x Jozef SPINZ      Feb 7, 1906 #65 - after 1953
              6o Lea SPINZ           1869 Krakow
                * unknown
                 7x Jozef SPINZ      Dec 8, 1903 #831
              6x Elias SPINZ         Mar 22, 1877 #357
                + Ester WINDISCH     Aug 3, 1883 #511
                      married Jan 17, 1904 #17
                 7x Jozef HOROWITZ         Sep 22, 1905 #674
                 7x Filip HOROWITZ         Jun 18, 1907 #414 - after 1948
                 7x Leon HOROWITZ          Jun 26, 1913 #445
                   + Tauba BERGER          Feb 16, 1926 Krakow
                         married Jul 30, 1946 Krakow
              6x Tobias SPINZ        Jan 28, 1881 #313
           5o Jachetta Liba WOHLS    Dec 29, 1845 (1846 #14)
           5x Juda Noach WOHLS       Aug 25, 1849 #324
           5o Zlata WOHLS            1851 #266
        4o Debora WOLSZ              1820 #163 - 1821 #158
        4o Laja Rayca WOLSZ          1823 #279
          * Wolf Smelke SALTZSTEIN   1821-22
                banns 1840 #43
    + Kayla GRYFFEL                  1788
          married Mar 13, 1818 #9
  2x Josuza WOLSZ                    1730-60
    + Rose Liba                      1745-60
  


  
1 Selig WOLTZ
 + unknown
  2x Fischel WOLTZ                   1768 - after 1798 {census family 426}
    + Basche                         1762 - 1833 #129 (Saul)
     3o Rosel WOLTZ                  1780
       * Leb Noah HAMBURGER          1778 - 1853 #184
             married May 27, 1798 Krakow
     3x Hirschel WOLTZ               Jul 25, 1802 Krakow
